title: 唔記得左加拿大的SIN號碼

replies.msg: 有冇人幫到手？我屋企人佢人在香港，唔記得左加拿大的SIN號碼，而家要用個SIN申請d政府嘢，可以點check返個號碼？佢已經冇晒稅單果d文件㗎喇。

Lost or stolen SIN

If your confirmation of SIN letter or SIN card was lost or stolen, Service Canada will not issue a new SIN. If you don't remember your SIN, you can find it on your income tax return or you can request a confirmation of your SIN from Service Canada.

https://www.canada.ca/en/employment-social-development/services/sin/after-applying.html

replies.msg: Thank you. 就係已經冇晒稅單果d文件先麻煩呀。

replies.msg: 如果以前報稅係搵會計師，佢可能幫到你？或者自己電子報稅可以搵番個login 入 CRA?
應該都係要call返 Service Canada
thank you for your responses, 最後都係要同Service Canada申請，等一個月。
